articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: HSBC shareholders to vote on whether to spin off Asia business at Friday's annual meeting - CNBC
articles.description: Taking center stage for investors will be two resolutions tabled by investor Ken Lui, which call for a spinoff of HSBC's Asia business and fixed dividends.
articles.content: Noel Quinn, chief executive officer of HSBC Holdings Plc, right, Mark Tucker, chairman, center, and Peter Wong, deputy chairman, during the bank's shareholders meeting in Hong Kong, China, on Monday,… [+3442 chars]
